email_chain.subject: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi John, I hope this email finds you well. I’m reaching out regarding your inquiry for a crude oil shipment. We have a suitable vessel, the MV Ocean Star, available for loading around October 20-25. The vessel has a DWT of 150,000 and an LOA of 280 meters. The starting freight rate is in the low 50s ($50.50 per ton). Let me know if this works for you or if you’d like to discuss further. Best regards, Sarah

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi Sarah, thanks for the quick response. The vessel details look good, but the freight rate is a bit higher than expected. Would you be able to come down to the mid-40s? Also, can you confirm the laycan window? Looking forward to your reply. Cheers, John

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi John, thanks for your feedback. I understand your concern about the rate. After discussing with the owner, we can offer $48.75 per ton, which is a competitive rate given the current market. The laycan remains October 20-25. Let me know if this works for you. Best, Sarah

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi Sarah, $48.75 sounds reasonable. Can we lock in the laycan at October 22-24 to narrow the window? Also, could you provide details on demurrage rates? Thanks, John

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi John, we can adjust the laycan to October 22-24 as requested. The demurrage rate is $25,000 per day, pro-rata. Let me know if you’re ready to proceed, and I’ll draft the charter party agreement. Best, Sarah

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi Sarah, everything looks good. Let’s proceed with the laycan of October 22-24 and the agreed freight rate of $48.75 per ton. Please send over the charter party agreement for review. Thanks, John

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi John, great to hear! I’ll prepare the charter party agreement and send it over by end of day. Thanks for your cooperation, and let me know if you need anything else. Best regards, Sarah
